item.title: Twitter might start charging $20 per month for blue tick: Report
item.description: Twitter might start charging $20 per month for blue tick: Report Twitter has planned to charge users $19.

item.title: How to install app updates on your Pixel Watch
item.description: How to install app updates on your Pixel Watch The Pixel Watch has its own set of apps that have been installed via the Play Store.

item.title: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for Meta, says Mark Zuckerberg
item.description: JioMart on WhatsApp a big opportunity for Meta, says Mark Zuckerberg As Meta doubles down on its monetisation drive across its family of apps, its Founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg has said that JioMart on WhatsApp in India will be a big opportunity for the paid messaging market.

item.title: LinkedIn: How to spot fake profiles on the platform
item.description: LinkedIn: How to spot fake profiles on the platform LinkedIn has introduced new features to allow users to spot fake profiles and remove them from the platform.
